sourcesContent:
Search for Flights
For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.number0fSeats}} remaining seats
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Flights } from '../models/flights'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: Flights[] = [ { airline: "SmartWings", number0fSeats: 500, departure: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Wrocław"}, arrival: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Bodrum"}, price: "250", }, { airline: "EnterAir", number0fSeats: 300, departure: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Warszawa"}, arrival: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Kraków"}, price: "100", }, { airline: "American Airways", number0fSeats: 550, departure: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "New York"}, arrival: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Berlin"}, price: "1570", }, { airline: "British Airways", number0fSeats: 200, departure: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Boston"}, arrival: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Texas"}, price: "370", }, { airline: "Lufthanas", number0fSeats: 250, departure: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Barcelona"}, arrival: {time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Paris"}, price: "200", }, ] constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void { } }
